name: Wandering Wanda
description:
GBDA 301 Final Project

Created for the Waterloo Region Mental Health Work Group and The New Economics Foundation.

Visual Assets: Alexandria Yuri Won

Sound Design: Konur Ozcan

Project Lead: Stephanie Donovan

Website Design: Yongxin Zhang

Game Development: Tawni Fus

Enjoy helping Wanda experience the Five Ways to Wellbeing, while learning some tips and tricks on how to incorporate them into your own life!

More information can be found at:
http://gbda301-group10.wixsite.com/5waystowellbein...
